description:
Built for abuse, these waterproof, supportive boots have high-traction soles and abrasion resistant uppers. Their lightness and flexibility allow a natural stride so you quickly cover the flat, boring sections and get to the interesting terrain sooner.

  • Anti-abrasion breathable mesh upper with a rubber mudguard
  • GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort membrane keeps water out and lets your feet breathe
  • Rubber toe and heel rand add durability in high-wear areas
  • 3D Flex System is hinged at the ankle to flex naturally
  • Injection-moulded MEMlex foam for support and cushion
  • Outsoles are Vibram® Mulaz for solid traction and edging
  • Rubber toe and heel rand add durability in high-wear areas
name: La Sportiva Trango TRK Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
